Class Kit

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cloudcraftgaming.novagameslib.kit.Kit

  • public class Kit
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by Nova Fox on 1/12/17. Website: www.cloudcraftgaming.com For Project: NovaGamesLib

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Kit(java.lang.String _name, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack> _items)
      Creates a new Kit Object for storing Kit data in memory when working with kits.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Kit

        public Kit(java.lang.String _name,
   java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack> _items)
        Creates a new Kit Object for storing Kit data in memory when working with kits. To create a new Kit, use KitDataManager.createKit(String, Player)
        Parameters:
        _name - The name of the kit.
        _items - A HashMap (int key is item slot, ItemStack) containing items in the kit.

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Gets the name of this kit.
        Returns:
        The name of this kit.

      • getItems

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack> getItems()
        Gets the Items in the kit, Int key is their respective inventory slot.
        Returns:
        The items in the kit.

      • getDisplayNameRaw

        public java.lang.String getDisplayNameRaw()
        Gets the display name of the kit WITHOUT color codes being translated. Use getDisplayName() to get the display name with color codes translated.
        Returns:
        The display name of the kit WITHOUT color codes being translated.

      • getDisplayName

        public java.lang.String getDisplayName()
        Gets the kit's display name WITH color codes translated. Use getDisplayNameRaw() to get the display name without color codes translated.
        Returns:
        The display name of the kit WITH color codes translated.

      • getDescriptionRaw

        public java.lang.String getDescriptionRaw()
        Gets the description of the kit WITHOUT color codes being translated. Use getDescription() to get the description with color codes translated.
        Returns:
        The description of the kit WITHOUT color codes being translated.

      • getDescription

        public java.lang.String getDescription()
        Gets the description of the kit WITH color codes being translated. Use getDescriptionRaw() to get the description without color codes translated.
        Returns:
        The description of the kit WITH color codes being translated.

      • getCost

        public java.lang.Double getCost()
        Gets the cost of the kit.
        Returns:
        The cost of the kit, 0.0 if no cost.

      • getDelay

        public java.lang.Integer getDelay()
        Gets the time delay, in seconds, for the kit.
        Returns:
        The delay for the kit, 0 if not enabled.

      • getDisplayItemName

        public java.lang.String getDisplayItemName()
        Gets the name of the item that is to be displayed in the kit selector GUI.
        Returns:
        The name of the item to display in the kit selector GUI.

      • getDisplayItemDurability

        public java.lang.Short getDisplayItemDurability()
        Gets the durability/damage modifier of the item to be displayed in the kit selector GUI.
        Returns:
        The durability/damage modifier of the item to display in the kit selector GUI.

      • setDisplayName

        public void setDisplayName(java.lang.String _displayName)
        Sets the display name of the kit. **NOTE** Please do NOT translate the color codes!!! Leave it in raw form!
        Parameters:
        _displayName - The raw display name of the kit.

      • setDescription

        public void setDescription(java.lang.String _description)
        Sets the description of the kit. *NOTE** Please do NOT translate the color codes!!! Leave it in raw form!
        Parameters:
        _description - The raw description of the kit.

      • setCost

        public void setCost(java.lang.Double _cost)
        Sets the cost of the kit. Set to 0.0 to disable.
        Parameters:
        _cost - The cost of the kit.

      • setDelay

        public void setDelay(java.lang.Integer _delay)
        Set the time delay, in seconds, to use the kit.
        Parameters:
        _delay - The amount of time in seconds.

      • setDisplayItemName

        public void setDisplayItemName(java.lang.String _itemName)
        Sets the name of the item to be displayed in the kit selector GUI.
        Parameters:
        _itemName - The name of the item to be displayed in the kit selector GUI.

      • setDisplayItemDurability

        public void setDisplayItemDurability(java.lang.Short _itemDur)
        Sets the durability/damage modifier of the item to be displayed in the kit selector GUI.
        Parameters:
        _itemDur - The durability/damage modifier of the item to be displayed in the kit selector GUI.
